abstract.original_text: publicly funded repositories, such as the WHO COVID database with rights for unrestricted research re-use and analyses in any form or by any means with acknowledgement of the original source. These permissions are granted for free by Elsevier for as long as the COVID-19 resource centre remains active. Barbara J. Tobis, RN, COHN-S has 35 years of nursing experience, with the past 21 years in occupational health nursing.
